item.title: Best Motherfucking Website
item.description: HugoModo Best Motherfucking Website Based on The Best Motherfucking Website, this theme provides minimal style definitions to create a clean, highly readable theme to be used as the base for customisation or for websites with a minimalist feel. Installation Simple The recommended way to install and use the HugoModo Best Motherfucking Website theme is to install the latest standalone version as a Git Submodule using the -b 0.1.0-standalone flag:
